description: This file is the main application component for a React frontend, defining the routing structure, including public and protected routes, route guards based on authentication, and page components such as Dashboard, Resources, Costs, Recommendations, Automation, Activity, Login, and NotFound.

methods.name: AuthIndex
methods.description: A React component that redirects users based on authentication state: to '/app' if authenticated, or to '/login' if not.

methods.name: App
methods.description: The main React component that sets up the application's routing structure, including default, public, protected, and fallback routes.
